sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"后悔"之意。
means: regret ： 指对已发生或未发生的事或行为表示后悔或婉惜。
repent ： 正式用词，语气较强，指对自己所做的错事或不该做的事感到深切的悔恨。

sentence.Network_en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentence.Network_cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentence.Network_en: From Cairo came expressions of regret at the attack.
sentence.Network_cn: 开罗对此次攻击表示遗憾。

sentence.Network_en: Her lack of co-operation is nothing new, I regret to say.
sentence.Network_cn: 很遗憾，我不得不说她缺少合作精神不是什么新鲜事。

恨字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 同本义〖 hate〗 遗憾;后悔〖 regret〗 违逆;不听从。通“很”〖 disobey〗.
英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... learn 学习 regret 抱歉，遗憾 hesitate 犹豫.
新大纲四级 - xieyuchao670的日志 - 网易博客 ... regarding 关于 regret 懊悔，遗憾，抱歉 regulate 管理，控制；调整，调节.

list.abs: 萝卡透纳芙：花蝴蝶 - 坐看云起的日志 - 网易博客 ...  No Regrets 不后悔 Quiereme Mucho / 深情爱我 (史提夫昆恩三重奏 ).
与Pale_-Within... ... love in snow 上田龙也 last regrets 雪之少女 dance to the death 纯音乐.

this night的中文歌词... ... now it's running ... 现在它在我的路上跑着 i regret 我很遗憾 to can't forgive 不能去原谅.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French regreter 'bewail (the dead'), perhaps from the Germanic base of greet

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 Regret是日本歌手星村麻衣于2007年发行的一首单曲作者简介 星村麻衣(Mai Hoshimura)日本著名歌手。出生于日本岛根县松江市。音乐大学钢琴专业在读。 2002年出道 诞生日： 1981年4月18日 身长 : 161cm 个人成长：4岁开始弹奏古钢琴，大学毕业后从事钢琴音乐创作。 高中三年，被索尼唱片公司挖掘，最终走上了音乐道路放弃了舞蹈球，合格后，从岛根来到了东京。 SONY唱片公司再次让她尝试，实现全垒合格。初次登场的她，一

entry.def: If you regret something that you have done, you wish that you had not done it.

example.ex: I simply gave in to him, and I've regretted it ever since...
example.tran: 我就向他屈服了，从那以后我一直后悔。

example.ex: Ellis seemed to be regretting that he had asked the question...
example.tran: 埃利斯好像后悔问了这个问题。

entry.def: Regret is a feeling of sadness or disappointment, which is caused by something that has happened or something that you have done or not done.

example.ex: My great regret in life is that I didn't bring home the America's Cup...
example.tran: 我这辈子最大的遗憾就是没有把美洲杯捧回家。

example.ex: Lillee said he had no regrets about retiring.

entry.tran: 为…抱歉;很遗憾地说/通知你
entry.def: You can say that you regret something as a polite way of saying that you are sorry about it. You use expressions such as I regret to say or I regret to inform you to show that you are sorry about something.

example.ex: 'I very much regret the injuries he sustained,' he said...
example.tran: “我对他的受伤感到很遗憾，”他说。

example.ex: I regret that the United States has added its voice to such protests...
example.tran: 我很遗憾美国也加入了这一抗议的行列。

entry.def: If someone expresses regret about something, they say that they are sorry about it.

example.ex: He expressed great regret and said that surgeons would attempt to reverse the operation...
example.tran: 他深表歉意，说外科医生会努力消除手术造成的损伤。

example.ex: She has accepted his resignation with regret.
example.tran: 她遗憾地接受了他的辞职。

means.word_mean: 1. sadness associated with some wrong done or some disappointment;

sentences.sentence: "he wrote a note expressing his regret"
"to his rue, the error cost him the game"

means.word_mean: 1. feel remorse for; feel sorry for; be contrite about
2. feel sad about the loss or absence of

sentences.sentence: "I regret I can't come to the party"
"I regret to say that you did not gain admission to Harvard"

auth_sentence.content: Why should we regret this it may be asked?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why should we regret this it may be asked?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why should we regret this it may be asked?

auth_sentence.content: We regret not acting faster to sort things out.
auth_sentence.res_content: We regret not acting faster to sort things out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We regret not acting faster to sort things out.

auth_sentence.content: It's my biggest regret that I never did.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's my biggest regret that I never did.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's my biggest regret that I never did.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 后悔的, 抱歉的, 惋惜的, 遗憾的
stems_affixes.word_buile: regret[n.&v. 遗憾,懊悔,抱歉]+ful……的→regretful后悔的, 抱歉的
regret[n.&v. 遗憾,懊悔,抱歉]+able……的→regrettable可叹的;可惜的
re回+gret问候,迎接,悲泣→n.&v. 遗憾,懊悔,抱歉

Sentence.sentence: They fear they will regret it afterwards.
Those who take risks they regret later on are usually very aggressive
Those who take risks they later regret usually focus on immolate benefits and simply haven't considered what might go wrong.
What is the author's regret about many American universities?
She regrets asking the man for help.
She regrets having bought one of the T-shirts.

means.word_mean: 懊悔, 惋惜, 遗憾

sentences.en: She will regret and she will want you here.
sentences.cn: 她会后悔, 她会要你留在这里。

sentences.en: I didn't regret the choice I had made.
sentences.cn: 我作了这个选择并不后悔。

sentences.en: You'll regret this.
sentences.cn: 这事你将会后悔的。

sentences.en: I regret to say that he is badly ill.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾他病得很重。

sentences.en: I regret to say you are wrong.
sentences.cn: 十分抱歉, 你错了。

sentences.en: I regret to have told him the thing.
sentences.cn: 我后悔告诉了他这件事。

sentences.en: I regret selling the house.
sentences.cn: 我后悔卖了房子。

sentences.en: He said he much regretted not being able to help.
sentences.cn: 他说, 他帮不上忙, 深感遗憾。

sentences.en: I regret that I shall not be able to come.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾, 我不能来。

sentences.en: I regret that you see it like that.
sentences.cn: 我很遗憾你那样看这件事。

sentences.en: I regret what I've done to her.
sentences.cn: 我后悔不该那么对她。

sentences.en: It is a matter to be regretted that he should have failed again in the examination.
sentences.cn: 他竟然又一次考试不及格, 这是一件令人遗憾的事。

sentences.en: I regret being unable to say that I cannot come.
sentences.cn: 我不能来, 甚为抱歉。

sentences.en: I regret having to tell you to leave[I regret to have to tell you to leave].
sentences.cn: 很抱歉, 我现在得叫你走。

means.word_mean: 痛惜, 懊悔, 遗憾, 失望, 悔恨

sentences.en: I have no regret about leaving.
sentences.cn: 我对离去一事毫不后悔。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister expressed her regret at the failure of the talks.
sentences.cn: 首相对谈判失败表示遗憾。

sentences.en: To his regret, he couldn't catch the train.
sentences.cn: 他没能赶上火车, 很后悔。

sentences.en: I declined with much regret your kind invitation.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾, 我不能接受您的盛情邀请。

sentences.en: I cannot come—please give them my regrets.
sentences.cn: 我不能来——请代我向他们致歉。

sentences.en: I have had four acceptances and one regret.
sentences.cn: 我已收到了四张应邀帖和一张辞谢帖。

sentences.en: I regret that I cannot come.
sentences.cn: 我来不了，很抱歉。

sentences.en: She regretted her lost youth.
sentences.cn: 她为失去的青春而感到惋惜。

sentences.en: I ought to have come earlier. I deeply regret.
sentences.cn: 我本应当早点来的，我真后悔。

jushi.english: Men will say things when their blood is up which, and they regret after they have cooled down.
jushi.chinese: 人们发怒时会说一些过分的话,当他们冷静下来又感到后悔。

jushi.english: I regret my ignorance of the subject.
jushi.chinese: 我很遗憾,对这个问题一无所知。

jushi.english: Don't tell the police about this—or you'll regret it!
jushi.chinese: 此事不要报警,否则你会后悔的。
